overview: When Vicki inherits a ranch from her uncle, she ends up having to share it with her hayseed cousin, Alex. So begins the sexual maneuvering as each of them tries to out-wit the other in a game of erotic cat-and-mouse. A classic tale of greed, treachery, and raw lust from award winning director John Leslie.
tagline: A Heapin' Helpin' of Ranch Undressing!
title: Hate to See You Go
